alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Carroll; Greene (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 12 at 9:25PM CDT until April 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Greene County in west central Iowa... Southeastern Calhoun County in west central Iowa... Northeastern Carroll County in west central Iowa... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Carroll, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Glidden around 930 PM CDT. Lake City around 945 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
